item.title: Install
item.description: In the past I knew jsonnet, however I didnâ€™t commit too much time to learn it until recently I encountered a data driven scenario, generating istio yaml configurations based on an array of data. The scenario is business driven, and I can foresee that there will be more data coming. What a waste of time to repeat the copy/paste procedures with little tweaks. I hated to do that. I figured out doing that data driven configuraton using jsonnet after spending half night yesterday.
